import React, { useEffect, useState,useContext } from 'react' import Definition from '../Definition/Definition' import DescriptionData from './DescriptionData' import { useSearchParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' import './ProjectDescription.scss' import UserContext from '../UserContext'; const ProjectDescription = () => { const [searchParams] = useSearchParams(); const idvalue=searchParams.get('id'); const details=idvalue.slice(1,33) const descriptionData=[]; descriptionData.push(useContext(UserContext)) console.log("Final value",descriptionData); const Description=[{ TMfixedCost: "3938493", resourcesUsed:10, weeklyCompletion: 45, numberOfStories: 45, featuresCompleted: 34, newBugs: 45, bugsFixed: 34, codeReview: true, unitTesting: true, weeklyCommunication: false, delay : 10, }] const others= [{ dependencies: " Dependencies in project management deal with managing and scheduling project tasks while keeping their sequences and requirements in mind. If task B requires the completion of task A,", riskMitigation: " No RiskMitigation", risks: "No Risks in the Week", supportRequired:
  • Uptime requirements for a service.
  • Data storage capacity per customer.
  • Back-up processes for managing risks.
}] return (
{console.log("divum",Description)} {Description.length > 0 && Description.map((data)=> )}
{others&& others.map((value) => )}
) } export default ProjectDescription;
